about_the_game:
There's a Duck Behind You! is a single player virtual reality game set at a duck pond. The pond is peaceful at first, but environmentally unfriendly choices lead to an action-packed fight against a duck who disapproves of your actions.

The core mechanic of the game is throwing picnic food at a duck while it attacks. Each food has a different ability, adding a layer of strategy to the fight.

Remember: Don't feed the duck at the park, but if you do, prepare for battle!
detailed_description:
There's a Duck Behind You! is a single player virtual reality game set at a duck pond. The pond is peaceful at first, but environmentally unfriendly choices lead to an action-packed fight against a duck who disapproves of your actions.

The core mechanic of the game is throwing picnic food at a duck while it attacks. Each food has a different ability, adding a layer of strategy to the fight.

Remember: Don't feed the duck at the park, but if you do, prepare for battle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
